title: Sheâ€™s Amazing
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
She came on scene
I felt like I was in a movie, she parted the room
The way that Moses did the red sea
And from across the room
I felt her body talking to me (yeah)
[Pre-Chorus]
'Cause thing about her, thing about her
Is she was amazing, so amazing
[Chorus]
She's amazing
She's amazing
[Verse 2]
No man alive would ever dream of talking to her
She gave off a vibe like
Come here, I want to see ya
And for whatever reason
I was feeling lucky that day
[Pre-Chorus]
'Cause thing about her, thing about her
Is she was amazing, so amazing

[Chorus]
She's amazing
She's amazing
[Bridge]
She's amazing in the daylight
She's amazing in the night
Once you see her, she's the only thing on your mind
[Outro]
She's amazing
She's amazing
Every time she walks in to the room
She's amazing, she's amazing
She's a party girl, she's a party girl
Everyone she meets
Starts dancing in the streets, cause she's amazing
Everyone she meets
Starts dancing in the streets, cause she's amazing
She's a party girl ...
She's a party girl ...
She's a party girl ...
